name: Monster Evolution - Evolve Beast of Mutant Tapper
name_original: Monster Evolution - Evolve Beast of Mutant Tapper
description:
•••••••••••New Evolution Game!!! ••••••••••••••
Monster evolution!!!
One day, some scientific experiments made those little monsters start to mutate.
Would you like to know what mutations happening to them?
Combine monsters to evolve them and discover their most strange, fantastic and visionary forms!
You never seen so many mutations and crazy features in other games!


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
INSTRUCTION
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
• Put same type monsters together to mutate new creatures
• Use monster coins to buy new animals and new tools update
• You can also tap the monster to make more coins
• Decorate you lovely monster in fitting room
• Lucky draw by flip the card
• More features can let the mutations more fun
• Mysterious Alien World


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
FEATURES
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
• There are more than 30 monsters for you to discover
• This game is a similar game with alpaca evolution but more fun
• Different endings and possibility: find your own monster world to be special one than others

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This is a simulator monster world, think you are one or the god of monsters.

Disclaimer: Although this Game is free to play, some content can be purchased for real money in game. If you do not want to use these features, please turn off in-app purchases in your device's settings.

Music: http://www.bensound.com
